scenario_text.value:
There might be other people here.
I wanna take a look around.
I’ve got to agree with Minoru on this one.

I knew it! That’s what I’m talking about,
partner!

It’s an honor to be called someone’s partner.
I’d want to be called a partner too.

It’s not that easy! To be a partner, you have
to pass some super intense tests...

Okay, I’ll have a look around!
You keep an eye on everyone, Takuma!

We have to come to a decision on this,
together. I want to hear from everyone.
Really? Well, think hard on it, then.

This is an important decision. Please
consider your options carefully.
